title: Basic Usage
content: You can use the Modal.alert method to set a pop-up box, and use the Modal.confirm method to set a confirmation pop-up box.

title: Maximized display
content: You can use the fullscreen attribute to set whether to maximize the display.

title: Press Esc to close the dialog box.
content: You can use the esc-closable attribute to set whether to close a window by pressing the Esc key. The default value is false.

title: Automatic shutdown delay
content: You can use the duration attribute to set the delay time for automatic closing. This parameter is valid only for type=message.

title: Prevent repeated prompts
content: If you do not want to click the window repeatedly, you can set a unique id to prevent repeated prompts. This parameter is valid only for type=message.

title: Lock the scroll bar
content: You can use the lock-scroll attribute to set whether to lock the scroll bar.

title: Lock the page
content: You can use the lock-view attribute to set whether to lock the page. Operations outside the window are not allowed.

title: Display Mask Layer
content: You can set whether to display the mask layer through the mask attribute. The default value is true.

title: Click the mask layer to close the window.
content: You can use the mask-closable attribute to set whether to allow clicking the mask layer to close the window.

title: Custom Content
content: You can set the content of the window through the message attribute.

title: Resize the window
content: You can set the width and height of a window by using width and height. You can set whether to allow dragging to adjust the window size by using resize.

title: Minimum width of the window after the window is resized
content: After resize is set to true, the min-width attribute can be used to set the minimum width of the window after being dragged.

title: Minimum height of the window after the window is resized
content: After resize is set to true, the min-height attribute can be used to set the minimum height of the window after being dragged.

title: The bottom is not displayed.
content: You can use the showFooter attribute to set whether to display the bottom. The default value is true.

title: The header is not displayed.
content: You can use the showHeader attribute to set whether to display the header. The default value is true.

title: Message Status
content: You can set the message status through the status attribute. The value can be info | success | warning | error | loading .

title: Title
content: You can set the title of the window through the title attribute.

title: Position from the top
content: You can use the top attribute to set the position of a message from the top of the message. This parameter is valid only for type=message.

title: Window Type
content: You can set the window type through the type attribute. The options are alert | confirm | message.

title: Bound Value
content: You can use the value/v-model attribute to bind a value.

title: Custom Stacking Sequence
content: You can use the zIndex attribute to set the custom stacking sequence. (It may be used in some special scenarios, such as when it is blocked.)

title: Cancel button event
content: The cancel event is triggered when the Cancel button is clicked.

title: Close button event
content: The close event is triggered when the close button is clicked.

title: OK button event
content: The confirm event is triggered when the OK button is clicked.

title: Window Close Event
content: The hide event is triggered when the window is closed.

title: Window Display Event
content: The show event is triggered when the window is displayed.

title: Window scaling event
content: The zoom event is triggered when the window is zoomed in or out.

title: Close the pop-up window. Are you sure you want to reset the form data?
content:
When the Modal nested form is used and the pop-up window is closed, reset the form data.

Set is-form-reset to false. If you close the pop-up window, the form is not reset.

title: Default slot
content: You can set the default slot by templete.

title: Bottom slot
content: You can set the bottom slot through slot="footer" .

title: Nested grid
content: You can nest grids through slots
